subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Petr Mrazek made 22 saves for his first postseason shutout, and Pavel Datsyuk, Riley Sheahan and Luke Glendening scored for Detroit, which took a 2-1 lead in its first-round series.
snippet: Petr Mrazek made 22 saves for his first postseason shutout, and Pavel Datsyuk, Riley Sheahan and Luke Glendening scored for Detroit, which took a 2-1 lead in its first-round series.
